name: No Connection (PaulPlay)
description:
A racing game where you can freely change car, however, it is the goal to get your own car to the finish line. Switch lanes to make space for your car, but be careful, other cars might switch back to a different lane! Can you make it to the 1st place before your car reaches the finish line? Made by ColaniYT and PaulPlay

IMPORTANT: In Firefox, fonts don't seem to load properly and the game sometimes has weird lag spikes. Please use a chromium based browser for the best results! :) Have fun (hopefully)
